Three genome regions upstream and downstream of known recombination breakpoints, 16, 17 including the ORF4b region carrying deletions in African viruses,
8 were amplified with established protocols (full list of genome regions is in the appendix [p 1]).
10 After initial phylogenetic analyses for preliminary genotyping, several samples representing all African clades of the virus and several samples from Saudi Arabia were chosen on the basis of initial viral load quantification ( appendix p 1) for full genome analysis using a combined RT-PCR and unbiased, non-amplified sequencing approach in an Illumina MiSeq instrument using 2 × 300 bp paired-end reads chemistry, as outlined in the appendix (p 1). The resulting sequences were assembled into full or near-full genome scaffolds and analysed for recombination.
